attributes.action: Stop the bank executives receiving bonuses
attributes.additional_details:
"Lloyds Banking Group is to seek approval to boost the pay packets of up to 400 of its most senior staff in a move which could stoke political tensions over bankers' remuneration."

Why are bank executives still receiving large bonuses? Surely the government should be saying no and instead take that money and put it back into building the country back up.

Cuts are being made to NHS services, benefits, pensions etc yet these bankers still get large pay packets and want more on top of that?!

 "Antonio Horta-Osorio, the bank's chief executive, will receive a £900,000 allowance in deferred shares which will boost his guaranteed annual pay to £2.6m."

Dont they get enough already?

the wrong people are being punished.
lets put a stop to this
